short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates the browser tab title with token information from multiple platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Photon Sol Market Cap Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension that automatically updates your browser tab title with the current market capitalization value when viewing Photon Sol on tinyastro.io.
Key Features:

Real-time market cap updates in your browser tab
Zero configuration required - works automatically
Minimal resource usage
Exclusively works on photon-sol.tinyastro.io
Clean, unobtrusive design

Perfect for:

Crypto traders monitoring Photon Sol
Investment researchers
Anyone tracking Photon Sol's market performance

How it Works:
Once installed, the extension automatically detects market cap changes on the Photon Sol page and reflects them in your browser tab title. This allows you to monitor value changes even when the tab isn't active, making it perfect for multi-tasking traders and researchers.
Privacy & Security:

No data collection
No external connections
Only runs on photon-sol.tinyastro.io
Minimal permissions required

Version: 1.0
Support: Telegram @Alex_H96
Last updated: December 13th 2024
